backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing inquiries and user profiles with admin‑restricted read/delete actions and basic health check.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, variables, and light/dark theme styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page bootstrapping the frontend with Hindi title and main script entry.
frontend/PREVIEW_VALIDATION_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist for validating preview deployments, including canister status, homepage checks, inquiry flow, and admin login behavior.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Production smoke‑test checklist covering homepage, contact info, inquiry submission, admin login, and backend canister health.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that captures unknown routes and redirects to root while preserving the intended path.
frontend/public/admin/index.html: HTML entry point for the admin route loading the same frontend bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling homepage layout and admin route guard with deep‑link restoration and redirect logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryAct: Provides per-inquiry admin actions such as marking read/unread, deleting, and bulk exporting inquiries.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryLis: Admin interface for filtering, searching, and managing inquiries with bulk read/unread actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/OfficialLo: Login dialog for officials with form validation, error handling, and authentication workflow.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Logo component rendering the Vaishnavi image at selectable sizes.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a styled fallback UI and allows users to reset and reload the app.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with business details, disclaimer text, and attribution links.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Interactive inquiry form with validation, submission handling, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/sections/AdminLo: Empty placeholder section file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details including address, operator, phone, WhatsApp, email, and hours using siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/FAQSect: Renders an FAQ accordion populated from siteContent.faqs inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Wraps and displays an InquiryForm inside a styled card section.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner showing business intro, call/WhatsApp buttons, login dialog trigger, and background image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Mission: Shows mission and vision text from siteContent inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Displays service categories with accordion-based detailed items sourced from siteContent.services.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Renders a grid of reasons to choose the business using icons and text from siteContent.whyChooseUs.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides static structured content for business info, hero text, mission, services, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Creates and manages an admin-capable backend actor with token-based initialization, retry logic, and readiness tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating admin inquiries with self-healing on authorization failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for loading, storing, and managing user identities and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialAdminToken: Reads and syncs the admin secret token from session storage, updating on auth-related events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLogin.ts: Implements a simple official login system that stores a session flag and admin token with event-based syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit an inquiry using the standard (non-admin) backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: React admin dashboard page handling login state, admin actor initialization, inquiry fetching, and error/retry UI flows.
frontend/src/utils/adminError.ts: Utility helpers for parsing admin-related errors, detecting authorization and replica issues, and extracting rejection details.
frontend/src/utils/inquiryExport.ts: Exports inquiry data to JSON or CSV, including CSV escaping, timestamp formatting, and type labeling.
frontend/src/utils/navigation.ts: Provides SPA navigation by updating browser history and dispatching popstate events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and enabling typography and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, issues, and admin-login behavior for the Vaishnavi E‑Mitra website.
